Note: Dear Ray(Mr. R. H. Coulter): I have blown up your transparencies, and am now returning them to you with a set of the pictures. I wish you would send them along to Rollo Jackson's children. How many remain if his family. I would appreciate it if you could give me their names and addresses. Again many many thanks for doing all this for me. Cordially, Lowell Thomas [unsigned]
